Comment: Your post highlights a crucial aspect of sustainable growth that often gets overshadowed by the allure of rapid expansion. For instance, leveraging AI and machine learning to optimize supply chain management and predict customer behavior can enhance operational resilience. Additionally, focusing on building a strong brand narrative that resonates with returning customers can foster loyalty and drive repeatability.
